website_summaries.verdict: A complete tank and bowl system currently available at the price point of one or the other. A great bargain for first-time home renovators or landlords.
pros: Extremely affordable model from a respected manufacturer
Elongated bowl size for additional comfort
cons: Low water line frustrates some customers

website_summaries.verdict: Similar to the original Drake 2 model, but ADA height. Dual flush action saves water and money. Quiet operation.
cons: Some complaints about low flushing power

customer_reviews.title: carefully inspect your toilet before you install it
customer_reviews.text: My thought was this is an expensive toilet ,no broken pieces in the box so it was fine to install. While I was adjusting it square with the wall noticed it is irregular. The base was not symmetrical and one point projected past the radius. To me this is an indication of no quality inspection by the manufacture. I have never had a cheap toilet have a noticeable defect like this. It does flush great which the American Standard it replaced never did. It is unacceptable for a toilet in this price range to be irregular.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: All parts missing
customer_reviews.text: All parts were missing. Called Toto and they were nice enough, but 7-10 day to mail parts. UNACCEPTABLE. WARNING: Check for parts BEFORE removing old toilet or you'll end up taking old off, putting new on - only to find NO PARTS, then taking new off, and putting old back together and resetting. I expect better.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge disappointment. We read great reviews, but first of all the top to the tank does not sit on the tank well. It looks bad. Secondly , the toilet bowl itself if off center. That looks bad, too. Lastly, I’m 5’ 7” and this toilet is so tall that only my toes reach the floor. If we hadn’t already installed it by the time we realized there were some real issues with this, we would have returned it and insisted on getting our money back. Spend the extra $$ and buy a Koehler that you can count on.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Not as quiet as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The bowl flushing process is quite noisy. The deep gargling sound will wake someone sleeping in an adjacent room. Also the bowl construction is so thin that a urination stream echos, something I have never heard from any toilet I can recall. I thought this Toto product would be of much higher quality and I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Works but defective
customer_reviews.text: We bought two. They both work great, with a quick powerful flush that clears it all. But one of them is defective. The tank simply won't sit squarely on the bowl, and the plumber can't fix the problem. One can't identify this kind of defect until installation, so we're now stuck with the flawed toilet while we wait for SupplyDotCom to decide on whether to approve our request for a return. And then we've got to switch out the bad for the (hopefully) good. Not real happy with this product, Mr. Toto!
customer_reviews.author: Cary Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not fit over the tank and looks like crap. Plus the toilet height, is higher than standard. BE AWARE of this. I ordered this toilet because it was listed as prime and I had a time limit. It did not come within two days. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Good investment!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is amazing! It is very quiet when flushed, yet is powerful. It comes with it’s own device (in the tank) and it looks different than anything I have seen. This one is chair height so it is a lot easier to get on and off. Why is it that toilets were originally so low? This toilet is the future! We bought a Toto S550e washlet to put on top of it. In the future we would like to replace all of our toilets with this toilet, with or without washlets. My husband installed it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dagostino

customer_reviews.title: Price Point Toto
customer_reviews.text: I loved being able to get an ADA Toto for under $300. Having several Totos, I was surprised at the quality control on this one though. Mine had rough areas in the finish on the outside where it didn't "porcenalize". Big areas, plus the back of the tank, fwiw. If you look at the toilet from the bottom, the base is lopsided not symetrical. Just sloppy manufacturing. My other Totos are flawless, and cost plenty more. The design is great and it works fine, but if you're particular about quality maybe this model should be avoided.
customer_reviews.author: westerndiver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toilet!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the TOTO toilet last week. My wife and I removed the old toilet and installed the new one in less than an hour. We have not been disappointed with our purchase. The toilet is 2 1/2" taller than our old one, which makes it much easier when you are as old as we are to to get up and down. The flush is amazing. It really scour the bowl clean when it flushes. Also, although it says it is a 1.6 gallon flush, I'm sure it uses only about a gallon of water at the most based on the recovery time to refill. Everything goes down the first time every time, at least so far. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: fastgramps

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful. I had to replace American Standard toilets that ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. I had to replace American Standard toilets that were "redesigned" to comply with a 1.6 gpf mandate. They did it by reducing the working volume of the tank, which destroyed performance. The Toto, however, with a larger discharge diameter, functions perfectly at two flush volumes. I originally chose Toto because of what A.S. did to me, but now that I have them, I am 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but ify quality control
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived with a shattered tank lid (no box damage) and had to be returned. The second one (from another store, as Amazon was out of them) had a defective flush valve that frequently failed to close after flush, making the toilet run. Tech Support sent me a replacement valve after the second call, and now the toilet works very well. It will flush just about anything. So will an American Standard Champion 4 for a lot less money. The premium price for Toto does not seem to bring corresponding quality control. Flush handle mechanism looks cheap. Time will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: i_reader

customer_reviews.title: Not All It's Cracked Up To Be
customer_reviews.text: This is, in my humble opinion, a sub-par toilet that has performed marginally in the year since we bought it., It's a big toilet and the flushing capabilities are "crappy." You have to have a toilet scrub brush handy to remove the "leftovers" after the system doesn't do it's job in routine flushing. After all the positive reviews we were shocked at how poorly this unit performed. Don't spend the big bucks on this model.
customer_reviews.author: Walorado

customer_reviews.title: Can a toilet be impressive? Why, yes.
customer_reviews.text: With a 1.6 gallon flush, it's going down. Plus, it's ADA compliant, meaning that it's a comfortable height for an adult. Our previous toilets were like those installed at a day care. Maybe if you're 5' tall, they were great. But for us, they were awful. In anticipation of my foot surgery, we replaced both mini/short toilets and wish we'd done it sooner. It seems really odd to get excited about having a couple of new toilets, but these are so much better than the Kohler ones we had before. We bought the Delta soft close toilet seats instead of the Toto ones. Cheaper and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Bowl is crooked
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these toilets and both were defective. Toilet bowl is crooked so the seat won't attach evenly.
customer_reviews.author: KimPich

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet! Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet! Works like a charm. Old one could take very little before clogging, so often we were using multiple (try 4!) flushes to make sure we did not end up having to use a plunger. This toilet has one "whoosh" which removes everything in the bowl, and then the reservoir fills up very rapidly. Very efficient. While it is marketed as ADA compliant, it should also be marketed as a more comfortable "sit". Having the extra height is wonderful even at my 5'4 height. And my 6'4 husband with long legs is ecstatic. We are a happy family :)
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine R. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged - TOTO immediately replaced
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with the tank damaged. I emailed TOTO and they immediately sent a full replacement. Not happy about the damage, but happy TOTO backed up their product without any hassles. We bought this because we were having troubles whooshing away materials. This did great solving that problem. Works very well. Have had for 4+ months and very happy. My wife thinks the bowls is a little high. She's 5"5" and she uses tip toes to stabilize. But... she's not complaining - she wanted a strong flush (check) and a taller bowl (check). Where it not for the damaged bowl, I'd give this a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy 1961

customer_reviews.title: Water water everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toilet and it seems to be functioning very well and has not clogged and washes the bowl pretty good. However I only gave it four stars because when I finished installing and turned on the water the top of the fill valve blew off and water went everywhere I am happy with the response from Amazon and they make good on it I called Toto and they said apparently a locking clip was missing and they did send a new valve But I do notice this Val is a different design and it took two weeks to arrive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in Mexico but works good
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it flushes it works great, but I'm not happy about the way the lid fits on the tank and that the base of toilet extends behind the tank on the floor. There is enough room for the single base board not the three quarter round on the bottom that I had to cut. It's made in Mexico not Japan,or China like I thought, I like the fit and finish of the Niagara toilet I bought but we have stopped it up twice,it only uses .8 gallons of water it's a good fit for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Comfort seating
customer_reviews.text: As a 6'1" guy, having an ADA compliant toilet makes a world of difference as far as the seating height goes. This replaced a toilet that was 2 inches lower and though it may not seem like much, it does go a long ways as far as comfort height goes. The toilet functionality is a powerful flush with minimal water usage for the force it delivers and the tank refill time is as quick as any I've experienced for toilets (not that I am particularly a toilet aficionado or anything). And a great value compared to competitors delivering similar specs. I would highly recommend to anyone looking to replace their existing toilet.
customer_reviews.author: NPchicago

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a used product
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a used product, not in a regular carton by Toto. And parts broke but only discovered when we were ready to install which was after return period.
customer_reviews.author: Sck

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these toilets. They came on a pallet and were delivered ahead of time and they called first before delivery. Our plumber recommended this brand and model as an option and I did lots and lots and lots of homework before buying ( since we were buying 3 and paying for installation on 3 also.) We are quite pleased. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lilacs & lilies

customer_reviews.title: Works great but....
customer_reviews.text: The toilet itself works great and I would totally recommend this to another user. My only issue, and I am sure this happens all the time, but my toilet arrived and I installed it but I didn't notice originally that the base of the toilet is not linear and looks to be warped during the make of this product. For that it gets a 3 star but the toilet works great just double check it when it arrives as I believe the "defective" or "warped" ones are sold online exclusively as opposed to in store, for obvious reasons.
customer_reviews.author: MS Spradley

customer_reviews.title: Tank lid does not seem to sit properly.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviews that the lid does not seem to sit correctly on the tank. Not sure what to do at this point as it's installed and working. I am happy to contact Toto and see what they suggest but I may end up eating what I spent and get a Kohler. Moral of the story, why buy a Lexus when you can get a great Toyota.
customer_reviews.author: RichLRN

customer_reviews.title: Toto makes great toilets
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Toto toilet that I have bought. They are very well made and function well. I noticed that they redesigned the mechanical flushing pieces within the tank. All the enhancements look well done. It is not like the older designs that I am used to seeing. The toilet is quiet both in filling the tank and flushing the bowl. I am very pleased overall. The packaging is superb. For a large two box package every delivery so far has come undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weigand

customer_reviews.title: Flushes every time
customer_reviews.text: I installed this new TOTO and a new American Standard (AS) toilet the same day, same house. No problems with this toilet. Give it a quick flush and away ya go. The AS toilet requires you to stand there and hold down the handle before you can leave or nothing flushes away. Our TOTO is far superior to our AS. The TOTO was delivered in 2 separate boxes. The packaging was outstanding. Would I buy this again? Yes
customer_reviews.author: Luvavacation

customer_reviews.title: Dont opt for a more expensive model
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is a great toilet. Extremely quiet and seat is a good 19 inches from the floor. In my opinion , it is a better toilet than the toto ultramax II that costs almost twice as much which I also have. That one will be replaced with a toto drake eventually because of the noiseless flush. Id recommend this seller as well, as it was sent with tracking within 24 hrs after purchase and arrived in perfect condition sooner than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nondescript

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed. Toilet is fully functional and reasonably priced,.... but... the casting is out of level, both the base and tank. The problem was obvious once the tank was installed, since the tile behind the toilet was level and called attention to the issue. The fix was to install galvanized shims under the bowl and between the tank and bowl. Not a perfect answer, but the problem was less noticeable. I would have been better off paying $20 more for a different toilet, manufactured with better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: 4dineros

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this toilet so much. This is the third one - I've been replacing the toilets in my home one - by - one with this taller toilet, which is so helpful for this taller person. The bone color is a more vivid color than the sedona beige, which is why I like it more than the beige. They didn't have the bone earlier, though. Glad they do now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for me but works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly expensive to not come with a toilet seat. This is my main complaint with the product. It works well in my basement (where basic gravity toilets don’t work well at all). I was pleased with the operation. I like the 2 flush options, but they should include some labeling because the average visitor to our house has no clue they can also pull the handle up for a bigger flush.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. The plumber wanted to charge me 250 to install one toilet. I took the chance and installed it myself. It was my first time and took me less than an hour and it was easy and looks great and nothing it loose. The flushing system works great. It flushes very quickly and isnt too loud. Tank fills up fairly quickly as well. If you can get it for a deal (under 250), then it is well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Owner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Performance!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with the performance of these three Toto units. We replaced 21 year old fixtures that were supposed to be "water efficient." Well, the old ones were not efficient. We chose these new Totos based on a recommendation from our friend who has retired from Toto. We are expecting a reduction in our water bill. In addition, they are easier to clean! They are well worth the investment and were easily installed by our handy son-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: Jonquillady

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet! Effortless flush. I'm used to tossing toilet paper in a waste basket because the toilet I had didn't have enough force to push the toilet paper down. That is not a concern w this toilet. I did notice that this toilet bowl doesn't fill as high as my previous toilet did so I feel like I'm not wasting as much water. Great value! I paid 260 plus free shipping. I was at a home supply store recently and this toilet was being sold for about $350.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Toto toilets are the best
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I have purchased. Toto toilets seem never to clog, work well. The flush is a little noisy but acceptable. Next time we need a new toilet, we'll get the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectech

customer_reviews.title: Fecal matter sticks to the bowl, this toilet is always filthy.
customer_reviews.text: My family did a bathroom renovation and we were attracted to this product because of its great reviews and because its depth (distance from wall) was extreme short. I will never buy this product again. Yes it flushes and does that job well. What's most and absolutely unacceptable is that, unlike any other toilet I've ever owned or used, this toilet gets very dirty, all the time. Fecal matter sticks to the bowl like white on rice, mud on a pig, a magnet to a fridge. It is bad. You'll be *constantly* cleaning this toilet. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C Mills

customer_reviews.title: The size is not standard at the bottom back, ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is not standard at the bottom back, make installing base board impossible, us brands does not have this problem. Make sure measure your space first. This one do need larger space at the bottom back. Flushing power is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Drake Toto toilets are the best! My husband and BIL installed the two of ...
customer_reviews.text: Drake Toto toilets are the best! My husband and BIL installed the two of them in a few hours. We purchased them because of reviews and the fact we wanted to save water. Now I am so happy to report they stay so much cleaner than my previous toilets, possibly due to the shape of the bowl and the way they flush. As promised there have been no clogs at all. It is an excellent choice and we are pleased . We have had them now for about 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Cyn @ North Bend

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a toilet? The packaging and directions were excellent. As an engineer, I always read all directions first even if I think I know what I'm doing. The installation went well, and the toilet is still working perfectly. I used our previous toilet seat, because the fit and color match were fine. I did not get the Toto soft closing toilet seat ($60) even though it might also be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N Rountree

customer_reviews.title: Height is great but...
customer_reviews.text: .. there's no lip on the tank cover. It just sits on top of the tank, rather than fitting over it like the lid on a shoe box. This means that it slips back and shows the unfinished edge of the tank.
customer_reviews.author: germantownmom

customer_reviews.title: Skip
customer_reviews.text: The toilet aesthetically looks pleasing and installation was fairly straight forward, the bowl and tank fills up fairly quickly, my only complaint is that the flush power left a little bit to be desired as it was not as powerful as I had hoped for. The recommended elongated seat from Amazon is also not as comfortable as I would have liked since I am a bit heavier individual.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Flushes everything best toilet out there
customer_reviews.text: Best toilet out there hav one in every bathroom had a kxxxx and got rid of it kept clogging it was only one year old it didn’t like it at all stick with Toto!
customer_reviews.author: FREDNJ

customer_reviews.title: Saves a lot of water
customer_reviews.text: This is the best water saving toilet that I have ever owned. We have a well and septic system (32+ years old) and the less you put into your system, the longer it will last. This unit uses a fraction of what the older toilet did and it never clogs. Unlike what Trump says, you don't have to flush and flush and flush. Everything goes down at once. It's expensive yes, but it will save you water and you won't need a plunger ever again.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Inspect closely, as the USA manufacturer clearly does not do their own inspection.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Toto Drake purchase, and the only one with issues. When they removed the tank from the mold, they made the two holes to bolt the tank to the bowl, but FAILED to clean up around the holes before kiln-firing the tank. The defects would make the tank leak, if not from the day it was installed, at some future date. Rather than risk it, I just re-used the old, properly made tank. Sad that the defective part was marked Made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob1

customer_reviews.title: As good as any Power Flush Toilet.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I have owned dozens of rental properties as well as hundreds of apartments, even commercial properties with restaurants and bars in them. I have also had power flush units in my own home and loved many of them. This is as reliable as it gets for residential use and more reliable than many commercial toilets. I rarely take the time to write a review but this product is deserving! If I am the one that needs to repair or unclog the toilet, then this is the one we are buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.  It FLUSHES like a BOSS!
customer_reviews.text: This sucker FLUSHES. No nonsense. No swirling. No wondering how high the bowl will fill before it goes down. No listening for a tell-tale 'glug' that has you reaching for a plunger. Just flush and - SWOOSH!! - it's down. Done. Buy this. We're getting a second one for our second bathroom asap.
customer_reviews.author: L. Breneman

customer_reviews.title: Great Elongated ADA toilet.
customer_reviews.text: My wife had her bathroom completely redone wall to wall and the finished program included a new toilet; this one. I liked it so much that I ordered one and installed it in my bathroom. In addition to the toilet I needed a new 'wax' ring and a slightly longer tank supply hose. Took about an hour start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Steve66

customer_reviews.title: You can flush a donkey down this thing!
customer_reviews.text: You can flush a donkey down this thing, best toilet I’ve ever owned. Get the slow close seat it’s quieter than a flea fart, saved me from waking up my grumpy wife on those late night pees. This is a man sized toilet so if your short you might need a stool. Five stars for quality ten stars if it lasts an eternity (we’ve already put it through some damage, so far so good).
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Liles

customer_reviews.title: Faultless Flushing with little water.....
customer_reviews.text: Aging brings on many changes in bodily needs, and an ADA compliant flusher finally floated to the top at our house. We couldn't find the TOTO locally, but good old Amazon had several models to choose from. The plumber that installed the TOTO said he sees very few of them in town, mostly in commercial applications when he does. He said this is an excellent low water usage device that meets the ADA requirements. The toilet installed very easily except for the uneven tile floor that required shimming, which, of course. was not the toilet's fault.
customer_reviews.author: The Aridzone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toilet.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toilet because the old one kept getting plugged up. The other reviews said it had a strong syphon and powerful flush. They were correct. It doesn't use a lot of water but really has a strong flush. Some say it's a bit loud, I didn't notice that. This is the SECOND one we bought. We were so pleased with the first one we decided to replace our other bathroom with this one.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great flush
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to get this toilet installed but it went fine. A very nice design with a little extra length as it is oval instead of round. The extra sitting height is very comfortable and the flush is impressive. Don't think I will be able to clog this baby up, but I can sure try. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toilet, with no more clogs!
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting for Christmas to get here before writing my review on this toilet. For the past 2 Christmas get togethers at our house we had about 30 people and both times I had to plunge the toilet at least once. I got this toilet to solve this problem and to get one that was a little taller. We had around 30 people again this Christmas with no clogs. The Toto Drake toilet worked perfectly and is still flushing strong. It was advertise to be 16 1/2" tall to the top of the bowl and is actually about 17" tall. I'd rather it be only around 16", 17" is a little tall but it is still a great toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Purchasing customer

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Toilet Arrived in Perfect Condition
customer_reviews.text: We've had very good luck with Toto Toilets in the past. However, this is the first time we've ordered one online. Anyway, we got the exact model we were seeking at an excellent price. The toilet arrived on the day promised and our contractor installed it without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rokidtoo

customer_reviews.title: Happy with second Toto Toilet
customer_reviews.text: We installed a one piece ADA Toto a few years back and have always been impressed how effective it is at moving all the contents of the bowl out. We have never had to flush twice. It is effective because of the 3" port from the tank to the bowl. Recently we needed to swap out an older toilet and decided to invest in another Toto. We bought a 2-piece Drake model and it works exactly the same as the previously purchased Toto.
customer_reviews.author: Lee F. Hunka

customer_reviews.title: Not ADA
customer_reviews.text: This toilet was listed as ADA compliant. NOT. regular height. We were gone when the plumber opened the box and installed it. So we are stuck! So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Candace C Baca

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and it really, really works!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I bought this toilet. It was easy to install. It works GREAT. I needed the higher size, much easier to get up and down now. I don't think this toilet will ever clog under normal use. Can't get over how fast and well it flushes. Very stylish and well made. if your needing one or are upgrading I would highly recommend this one... MADE IN THE USA!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Barb H

customer_reviews.title: Toto is tops
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 toilets between my 2 homes. This is the 4th Toto we've purchased and installed in the past several months. "It really gets the job done." Enuff said. P.S. One of the first Toto's stopped working a couple months ago. I emailed Toto customer service and a nice gentleman helped troubleshoot. turns out that when the local water district flushed the water lines, debris got into the water line and stopped the flow of water into the tank. The hubs followed the instructions provided by Toto and easy-peasy, the toilet works again. This was a first for us, but we haven't had the low-volume toilets long enough to have experienced the seasonal flushing.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product But........
customer_reviews.text: This is No fault of Amazon or the Toto Toilet. But Be Aware....ADA is an acronym for American Disability Act. This is a tall toilet and not a standard height. So had to pay a plumber once to install it and again to bring him out to remove it so ended up over budget. But. Toilet quality was excellent and ordered another this time in standard height.
customer_reviews.author: roman satur

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! We had two in our last house ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! We had two in our last house and really wantes one for our new House. The other two, purchased from another company, (six or seven years ago) took six weeks to arrive from New Jersey. This one came in about seven days from Utah. Alas, there was a big crack in the tank. We contacted the company, with a picture of the crack and a new tank was delivered in about five days, in fine shape. We are very happy to have it. I recommend it very highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo R.

customer_reviews.title: High quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. Works perfect. First one is over ten years old. DON't buy American Standard two tanks cracked in three years. They didn't offer any assistance. I highly recommend ToTo Drake."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on Time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toilet because I have an 11 inch rough in, it fits great. There is about 1/4 inch of space between the wall and the back of the tank. Toilet works great no problems with blockage.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Seems to be excellent quality. Came with all tank parts installed, which was not expected. They look specific to this brand, so hope any replacement needs are not too expensive.... But do love the increased height and the toilet overall.
customer_reviews.author: OutDoorsWoman

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and well, elongated bowl a boon, not a quiet fill
customer_reviews.text: Packing was first class, I rolled the box end-over-end up the stairs and it survived just fine. Install was a breeze with an extra meaty wax ring cuz my flange isn’t very tall. The key feature to this puppy is the elongated bowl, as the previous Toto, which served valiantly, alas, interfered with my junk.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Toilets arrived undamaged and super well packed in overboxes with sprayed in foam packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: Toilets arrived undamaged and super well packed in overboxes with sprayed in foam packaging material to protect the toilets. Plan on a large load of foam and card board when you unpack the toilets. Toilets are great and love the added seated height. I will go with the ADA sized toilets for all future installs.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful toilet. I will buy another one for my 2nd bathroom. The suction is very powerful and the bowl seems to clean itself. It does have a weird nose at the end of a flush--like a flapper slamming shut, but you get used to it. Easy to install, also. Good buy. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: KayCee

customer_reviews.title: It’s a flusher!
customer_reviews.text: Just do it. Get this Toto toilet you won’t be disappointed. Very easy to install. This thing flushes like a champ. I’ve used other name brands and this one is great value for the quality of a fine toilet. Happy flushing.
customer_reviews.author: DAY-VER

customer_reviews.title: King of Flushes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on reviews on here solely. Thing flushes great, it has been in use for a few months now and even house guests since its on their end of the house. First one showed up with a perfect box, packed with foam to the hilt, the box in the box was damaged and the base was in pieces. Obviously not broken by UPS. Contacted Amazon and great customer service, new set sent out instantly and call tags provided for the broken toilet for UPS to pick back up. Love Amazon! Very easy to install, I am the farthest thing from a plumber and knock on wood so far no leaks. Great flushing power and so far zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice, but sits high off the floor.
customer_reviews.text: The color and design are nice, and the flush is VERY powerful, using only a tiny amount of water. The only drawback for me is that it's very high off the floor. At 5"1', my feet don't touch the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Jude Pages

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best commode on the market!
customer_reviews.text: The Toto Drake is the best commode on the market today! We like the high rise commode - especially good if you are tall and your knees are cramped. I had bilateral knee replacement several years ago and the high rise commode makes it easier for me to be comfortable -
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and great flushing toilet. Well worth the money. Glad I bought it. Bought a Kohler Wellworth,at the same time, for a small powder room and the Toto is far superior in flushing efficiency. Toto was also $50.00 less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: denandbert

customer_reviews.title: Toto Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Now that the Totos are made in Mexico, I have seen that the quality of workmanship is not the same as when they were made in Japan. Toto used to make the best but the Mexican manufacturing is not up to par with the original Japanese made Totos.
customer_reviews.author: John Carver

customer_reviews.title: Wapoo and it's gone...
customer_reviews.text: Small dogs beware. The vortex created is amazing, any a small animals near the event horizon risk being pulled in.
customer_reviews.author: Rio Bravo Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Love our new toilet and so happy it arrived in one piece. We had ordered from two places and this was the best packed of all by far.
customer_reviews.author: s. clement

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet...
customer_reviews.text: Had a plumer install. He mentioned that TOTo was his favorite toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat Toto
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 bathrooms and have Toto in each one. Very dependable and bought this on Amazon at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: SamuraiFilmGuru

customer_reviews.title: This TOTO Toilet lives up to the great reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Our toilet was constantly clogging. Our son seems to issue challenging output. Doesn't challenge this TOTO Drake! We are quite pleased. Quiet and quick also. Item well packaged and seller stayed in contact to let us know they were there if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott or Candy Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Power Dumper
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toilet! My big 300lb buddy went out to eat with us and i always cringe when he uses our bathroom, Well to make a large story short everything that guy seems to destroy that toilet handles fine! This toilet replaced a 1 year old menards toilet that seemed to hardly flush and always left me with nasty surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic toilet. I live with 5 males in the household so Lord knows I need a toilet to work. This one does, flawlessly. No clogs, flushes perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: kgrant67

customer_reviews.title: It flushes very well  and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Our plumber ( who we have used for 10yrs and trust) highly recommended Toto brand which we hadn't heard of. I'm glad we took his advise and got one. It flushes very well and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: aucoin

customer_reviews.title: This Toilet Means Business
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot about dual flush units, plenty about different features, heights, handles etc. Bottom line is the toilet, installed without an issue, is a great height. The flush is so fast and powerful that I don't see the need for the complexity of a dual flush unit and the refill time is twice as fast as my more expensive Kohlers. For the price, free shipping and good packaging this is one of those safe bets. Word of caution the Toto seats are kind of weak, chose a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Douggy Dizzler

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious Short/Powerful Flush Cycle. Very Quick Tank Refill
customer_reviews.text: This is an ADA-compliant toilet, and as such sits higher than the standard installations in most older homes. As a consequence, small poops fall further and the splashing water tickles my bottom. This is the only flaw in an otherwise brilliant design. The flush cycle is short and powerful thanks to the ingenious shape and size of the evacuation port -- everything goes down. Very short time needed to refill the bowl, and 360-degree rinse from under the rim means no skid marks from the occasional torpedo turd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install, nice looking and friendly to use. It’s great value for the price. I consider it one of the best we had
customer_reviews.author: Lofty Basta MD

customer_reviews.title: Great flush.
customer_reviews.text: Great flush mechanism means no double-flushing required. It's a Toto- a high quality piece. Works as expected. Love the higher height. Have owned four of these and used it to replace a older Am Standard unit. great value buying thru Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cram45

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: The best by far! I purchased one last year for a new bathroom going into an addition on our house. I couldn't believe how great it was--strong, quick flush. I loved it so much I recently purchased three more and upgraded the others throughout the house--we were having clogging "issues" with our old builders-grade toilets due to two teenage sons. What a difference! I am a semi-handy housewife and I had no problems installing these by myself.
customer_reviews.author: njdiyhousewife

customer_reviews.title: bowl
customer_reviews.text: It is a low flow toilet but that feature has a effect of not really cleaning the bowl very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rood

customer_reviews.title: Flushing Meadows
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and comfortable commode. The installation and instructions were good, the packaging very good. Just make sure you order the correct toilet, or the shipping back will cost you. I purchased 2 of these. Happy after 1 month of use. The only issue I had was that my water pressure was too high and caused the valve to regulate the water flow into the tank by stopping and starting, and making strange noises. Replaced my water regulator to the house, and the issue went away.
customer_reviews.author: ALLEGRA I.

customer_reviews.title: 25 years in the plumbing trade and TOTO brand is ...
customer_reviews.text: 25 years in the plumbing trade and TOTO brand is the only toilet I would have in my home. Need I say more.
customer_reviews.author: John DeMaine

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking toilet
customer_reviews.text: Have several of this toilet in out lake house and our house in Atlanta. Like the look and the function.
customer_reviews.author: Scubasally

customer_reviews.title: It's just what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: I needed a toilet with the highest available water pressure, due to my cesspools and the location of the bathroom. This was the one that was available in the least amount of time. It's not the best looking toilet out there, but it does the job and is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: longtime24fan

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet
customer_reviews.text: As good as it gets for a toilet. Never clogs. Could use more water in the wash down areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the toilet bowl. It flushes real well. The customer service at plumber stock is great too. We had a major renovation going on in our house. We had one bowl accidentally mailed back and one tank was cracked while trying to install it. In both instances plumber stock took care of the situation.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very High quality, minor blemish on tank lid
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on Toto’s reputation. The toilet is very well-made. My only gripe was a minor flaw in the porcelain finish on the tank lid. It’s very minor but I did not expect it.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues getting this toilet installed and it looks very good. The tank is more narrow than my previous toilet that I think makes the water closet that its in look a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Weird to order a toilet from Amazon but very successful
customer_reviews.text: I arranged for a plumber to come and install the toilet. It arrived with a box a little beaten up in one corner, but inside everything was perfect. The packing was excellent. It also arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JackieR

customer_reviews.title: The Bomb
customer_reviews.text: Got a little mixed up on my reviews, this toilet is the bomb...... the water tank fills up so fast, wish I had ordered this yrs ago. Luv it.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three of these toilets and now having issues with 2 of the 3 of them two years later. When I called Toto customer service they recommended I replace the flapper and valve. I received these parts but they didn’t work because the model number from my order is different than the model number inside the tank. Buyers beware you may not be getting what you think your buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Jaunese

customer_reviews.title: awesome toilet
customer_reviews.text: when they say that this toilet will flush just about anything they were not kidding. I had to replace a toilet on a line that simply wouldn't flush and my plumber had told me that it was just a cheap toilet and that was the reason it didn't work. I didn't really belive him but followed his advice anyway.....wow, what a difference. this thing could flush a stack of bowling balls if they were big enough to fit through the drain
customer_reviews.author: abraham Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Pooing in Peace
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'5 with lower back pain that comes and goes and getting this taller toilet has made all the difference with my comfort when doing a #2. I love it so much, I only want to poo at home. If I have to go somewhere else, it feels like on practically on the floor now.
customer_reviews.author: benjimatic

customer_reviews.title: Great flush.
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a super good toilet, the best I ever had. It also is a bit higher which I love. It flushes very well and is a product I would highly recommend. It also meets the ADA requirements for height.
customer_reviews.author: Looker

customer_reviews.title: Our third purchase of this brand.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. We have two other Toto toilets. When it came to remodel our daughter’s bathroom, we ordered another Toto.
customer_reviews.author: MilleG

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be the quality I desired
customer_reviews.text: After some mix up with the seller...I received this TOTO toilet.... it is well made, operates very well, and is quiet... hoping it last for many years....
customer_reviews.author: Roy Bolling

customer_reviews.title: Hairline crack in tank caused a slow leak.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Toto Drake toilet. I love the toilet. The tank had a slow leak from a hairline crack on the right hole for mounting it to the base . My plumber used an rtv cured overnight to fix the leak, but I am still concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Pdeclerck

product_meta.title: TOTO CST744SL#01 Drake 2-Piece Ada Toilet with Elongated Bowl, Cotton White
product_meta.description:
Color:Cotton White| Style:No SeatThe TOTO Drake Two-Piece Elongated 1.6 GPF ADA Compliant Toilet offers a high-profile design and is powerful and durable enough to work within both residential and commercial applications. The Drake bowl and tank set includes a tank to bowl gasket, tank to bowl hardware, and toilet bolt caps. The Drake utilizes TOTO’s G-Max flushing system which features a 3” wide flush valve, extra-large siphon jet, and a large trapway. This reliable combination generates a powerful cleansing flush with 1.6 gallons of water. This version of the Drake is a reflection of TOTO’s People-Centered Design, complying with the Americans with Disabilities Act accessibility guidelines while maintaining the beauty and innovation expected from TOTO. This version of the Drake comes with a left-hand chrome trip lever. Additional items needed for installation and use must be purchased separately: wax ring, toilet mounting bolts, water supply lines, and toilet seat.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
TOTO High profile close coupled toilet with 12-Inch rough-in. ADA compliant. Low consumption (6 Lpf/1.6 Gpf) siphon jet flushing action. Tank with lid, fittings, chrome plated trip lever, less seat. With unrivaled vision and innovation expertise, TOTO leads and never follows in designing, engineering, refining and delivering innovative technology that enhances your daily life. TOTO's innovations translate into the best performance and ecology in the plumbing world. TOTO leaves nothing to chance when it comes to design. TOTO embraces holistic design principles because performance, quality, functionality and ultimately, customer satisfaction, are just as important as aesthetics. Backed by precision engineering and global manufacturing, great designs address functionality and performance as well as beauty. Attention to detail, continuous improvement, over a thousand research and development professionals and 90+ years of experience fuel TOTO's product quality. TOTO provides unmatched performance, durability and reliability, representing the ultimate in customer satisfaction for our toilets, faucets, lavatories, showers and products for the entire bathroom. Superior quality backed by over 90 years of experience creates many benefits. TOTO installations offer peace of mind and performance you can count on. Reliability translates into reduced maintenance costs and superior performance.
feature_bullets: Item may ship in more than one box and may arrive separately
Universal Height, Two-piece design with high-profile tank
12" Rough-in, less supply, Water Use: 1.6 GPF/6.0LPF, Material: Vitreous china
Chrome trip lever, ADA compliant, in. Water Pressure: 8 psi (static)
Water Surface: 10-3/8 Inch x 8-1/4 Inch, Trap Diameter: 2-1/8 Inch, Trap Seal: 2-3/8 Inch, Warranty: One Year Limited Warranty
G-Max Flushing System: Quiet, powerful, commercial grade flushing performance
Fast Flush: Wide 3-Inch flush valve is 125-Percent larger than conventional 2-Inch flush valves
Wider, 2-1/8-Inch computer designed, unglazed trap way.
Large water surface, it includes the tank lid not the toilet seat.
G-Max flushing system, low consumption (1.6GPF/6.0LPF), Elongated front bowl and tank set, less seat

specifications.Included Components: Install hardware, Toilet Tank, Toilet Bowl
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars595 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
